hero.title: Put Your Appointments
hero.description: Ditch the phone tag. Let your clients book 24/7 via BookIt while you focus on your work.

features.title: Features That Grow Your Business
features.subtitle: Not just scheduling, but full-scale management.

payment.title: Online Payments
payment.desc: Get paid at the time of booking.

brand.desc: Next-gen appointment management platform for your business.

newsletter.title: Stay in the Loop
newsletter.desc: Latest features and tips directly to your inbox.

hero.title: Full Toolkit for Your Business
hero.desc: More than just a calendar. BookIt provides everything you need to manage, grow, and automate your business.

notifications.title: Automated Reminders
notifications.desc: End no-shows. Automatic SMS and Email notifications ensure your clients show up. Reduce missed appointments by 80%.

customization.title: Custom Branding
customization.desc: Customize your booking page with your logo, colors, and rules. Clients see you, not BookIt.

cta.title: Ready to give it a try?

Pricing.title: The Right Plan for Your Business
Pricing.subtitle: Not just a calendar, but your business's digital branch. No hidden fees.

labels.footer_text: Custom SLAs and invoicing options available for enterprise businesses.

About.title: Designing time, not just appointments.
About.subtitle: Using technology to simplify life, not complicate it.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To enable the digital transformation of SMEs with tools that require no technical expertise.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To create an ecosystem where service providers worldwide can focus solely on their craft.

story.title: Why Did We Start?
story.p1: BookIt was born from watching a business owner struggle to focus on clients due to constantly ringing phones. We believed there was a third way for those stuck between traditional agendas and complex software.
story.p2: Our goal is not just to sell a booking calendar; but to offer your business's digital showcase, receptionist, and assistant in a single modern interface.

Auth.subtitle: Log in or sign up to access your account.
